Articles.Content:
My Pc needed its mainframe reformated and I had to restart KSP; now that I've done Mun, Min, (one way) Duna & Eve runs, I've got the blues because the trips of getting to outer planets no longer have the same mystery as the first time...

My Pc needs a hug ( )

Edited January 23, 2014 by Lohan2008
Gahhhhh, do I also have to rebuild the Space Station again ?? /sigh

Ahh the days of XP, I have only had to do two fresh install of windows since XP. Both due to major hardware changes only.

I pretty much just carry across my steam folders on an external, steam copes pretty well as long as you are careful and methodical.

Integration into the Steam cloud and the option to tell KSP where to save - I think at least the second option could be done for .24 already, Squad?

Although I like being independent from Steam.
Try sending something strange to each planet, like giant metal spiders or drag-racer rovers? That always motivates me.
